name: WPrez
author: Russell Fair

sections.description:
WPrez uses impress.js and WordPress allowing you to create awesome presentations similar to “Prezi.com”. They run 100% in the browser so you don’t need any software to view them.

Demonstration

  1. Coming Soon
sections.installation:
1. Unzip the plugin file and upload wprez to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin options and start creating presentations.
sections.faq:
A question that someone might have

An answer to that question.
sections.changelog:
0.1.1 Fix wpautop issue, make adding new lides on the backend easier, remove slide title from presentation output
0.1.0 Fixes problems with preview and normal post types, removes image function in slides, adds numeric inputs in metabox
0.0.4 Release to WordPress .org repository
0.0.3 Create initial JS needed to disable theme on single WPrez’s
0.0.2 Add repeatable steps to WP backend
0.0.1 Initial Release

short_description: WPrez allows you to make beautiful presentations (in the form of "Prezi.com") right from your WordPress hosted website or blog.
